mapper.sql: id, app_name, apk_name, code, size, description, version, force_update, url, channel_name, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_apk_version WHERE app_name = #{appName} AND channel_name=#{channelName}
SELECT * FROM t_apk_version WHERE code = ( SELECT MAX (code) FROM t_apk_version WHERE app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert:

id,

version,

mapper.update:
update t_apk_version
app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apk_name = #{apkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER},
size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{force_update,jdbcType=INTEGER},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
channel_name = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
